definition: without authority/to usurp/to arrogate to oneself/to monopolize/expert in/to be good at

sentences.english: Therefore, without the doctor's advice, do not presumptuously use it.
sentences.chinese: 故没有医生的指导请不擅自使用。

sentences.english: He acted without reference to his superior.
Worker do sth without authorization asks all fee of doctor pay a home visit all provide for oneself by him worker.
sentences.chinese: 职工擅自请医生出诊的一切费用，均由职工本人自理。

sentences.english: Alterations to the terms of an insurance shall not be made without the approval of the Project Manager.
sentences.chinese: 未经建筑师许可，不能擅自变更保险条款。

sentences.english: Students must remain on campus at all times.
sentences.chinese: 学生在营队期间不得擅自离开校区。

sentences.english: If tampers with the manuscript to originate arbitrarily, this net will hold responsible legally.
sentences.chinese: 如擅自篡改稿件来源，本网将依法追究责任。

sentences.english: His action without authorization has stymied the whole plan.
sentences.chinese: 他擅自采取的行动已经妨碍了整个计划的实施。

sentences.english: If you make a decision without consulting her , you're a chauvinist pig , you bastard .
sentences.chinese: 如果你不请示她而擅自做了决定，混帐，你这头沙猪。

sentences.english: You can't take it upon yourself to make important decisions like that.
sentences.chinese: 你不能擅自做出那样的重要决定。

sentences.english: Seals affixed by the Customs shall not be opened or broken by any person without Customs authorization.
sentences.chinese: 海关加施的封志，任何人不得擅自开启或损毁。

sentences.english: Who are they to tamper with the rules of the game?
sentences.chinese: 他们凭什么擅自修改比赛规则？

sentences.english: If you jaywalk, you could easily get hit by the car.
sentences.chinese: 如果擅自穿越马路，很容易被车子接到。

sentences.english: This book is copyright protected so no adaption should be made without the writer's permission.
sentences.chinese: 这本书受著作权保护，未经作者许可，不得擅自改编。

sentences.english: I hated to barge in without an invitation.
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌不经邀请，擅自闯入。

sentences.english: A feature that prevents the altering of parameters without first disarming the "lock-out."
sentences.chinese: 一种功能，防止擅自改变解除“锁定第一参数了。”

sentences.english: Party B should not change the teaching schedule.
sentences.chinese: 不能擅自改变教学计划。

definition: not having undergone/without (having gone though a certain process)
must not/may not/not to be allowed/cannot
to have no right/to have no authority
